snippet: Diego Costa and Oscar each scored twice in the Premier League leaders’ 5-0 victory as the Welsh club suffered its worst home loss in 24 years.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Chelsea routs Swansea, 5-0; other soccer matches and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Diego Costa and Oscar each scored twice in the Premier League leaders’ 5-0 victory as the Welsh club suffered its worst home loss in 24 years.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Wins by Five and Widens League Lead
headline.main: Chelsea Wins by Five And Widens League Lead
